content: पक्ति, पक्तृ, पक्व &c. See under पच्.

पक्व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पच्-क्त तस्य वः] {@--1@} Cooked, roasted, boiled; as in पक्वान्न. {@--2@} Digested. {@--3@} Baked, burned, annealed (<ab>opp.</ab> आम); प्रक्वेष्टकानामाकर्षणं <ls>Mk. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Mature, ripe; पक्वबिंबाधरोष्ठी <ls>Me. 82.</ls> {@--5@} Fully developed, come to perfection, perfect, matured; as in पक्वधी. {@--6@} Experienced, shrewd. {@--7@} Ripe (as a boil), ready to suppurate. {@--8@} Grey (as hair). {@--9@} Perished, decaying, on the eve of destruction, ripe to meet one's doom. --क्वं Cooked food.
